DOC.brief_summary: The analysis conduct previous population-based cohort study use The Health Improvement Network database UK ( Cai et al 2009 ) .The aim post hoc analysis : To estimate relative risk uncomplicated symptomatic peptic ulcer ( UPU ) associate use low dose aspirin ( ASA ) anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs , steroid ) general population To estimate dose-response duration-response associate use drug To estimate relative risk UPU associate naive/non-naive use low dose ASA general population To evaluate effect proton pump inhibitor ( PPI ) ( alone combination anti-inflammatory drug ) occurrence UPU general population To investigate management low dose ASA/oral antiplatelets UPU
DOC.brief_title: Risk Uncomplicated Peptic Ulcer General Population
